text.value: This door is locked.
...A small dog?
No answer.
There's a frat party going on but you're just a kid. No party for you.
Hey there... New face in town, eh? I'm Sharol, nice to meetcha. Got any spare change?
Well if you don't got any that's okay. Just be careful passing through town now. Franky and his bison gang are a rowdy bunch.
They stole my purse... Also bullied that Elk kid. No one will stand up to them though...
Good luck out there kiddo.
Thank you Nori. I feel a bit better now.
(...Callum is gone.)
Psh who are you? Get out of here punk!
Why do you keep bugging us? Haven't you taken the hint? Get lost you loser!
Wait... You killed that elk nerd?
What's with that creepy look? G-get away from me!! You... You freak!
(Franky ran away)
...I guess I'll go appologize. You won't back off if I say no anyways. You win Nori.
(Franky went to apologize)
(...Frankie is gone.)
'The Life of Mr. Theodoropoulos' - A book about the life of some tech teacher. Wonder who he is? ...I wonder if you can answer that.
'Big Brain Academy' - It seems like a university textbook... Not that interesting.
'Super Mayo Bros.' - It's a manual for a game... What's that doing here?
'The Theory of Quantum Physics' - There's a bunch of incoherent techno-babble inside... Not interested.
'Top 10 Anime Betrayals' - ...I liked the YuuToob video better.
'2.5 Funny Knee-Slapper Jokes' - The last joke is half baked.
'57 Interesting Snail Facts' - Seems familiar... The first one says, 'Snails can sleep for 3 years!' ...Wish I could do that.
'Stay Hydrated' - It's a book entirely based on good water-drinking habits. Interesting...?
Hey there! Passing through town? Well take a look around our library. There's plenty of interesting selections available.
If you're looking for a bite to eat, check out Arlo's! She's got the best food in town... Although Franky's gang is always sitting just out front.
Yeah, Franky likes to hang out there. Poor Arlo doesn't get a break. You should visit her if you get the chance.
